hero.intro: I work for teams who need design and delivery of interfaces that feel good to use. Turning ideas into intuitive interfaces. My work is thoughtfully designed, carefully built, and tested against real-world chaos. I've spent 4 years shipping digital products for major publishers like WIRED, TIME, and Condé Nast. Available for freelance projects and ongoing support.

about.title: About
about.quote: I really enjoyed working with Jane at Samwise. She is a dependable, thoughtful frontend developer who deeply cares about accessibility, performance, and user experience. Jane collaborated naturally with UX and engineering, took ownership of her work, and always approached problems with a calm, solutions-focused mindset. She was a pleasure to have on the team and someone I'd happily work with again.
about.body: I'm a UX Engineer and front-end developer focused on accessible, high-performing interfaces. I work across UX strategy, interaction design, and implementation — from concept to production-ready builds.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: A mix of UX thinking, product strategy, and technical execution.

timeline.title: Freelance Design & Development
timeline.description: Worked across diverse freelance design and development projects, creating and implementing corporate brand guidelines and graphic designs aligned to client brand identities. Focused on building user-friendly, intuitive digital products.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Built responsive and accessible web interfaces using SCSS, JavaScript, HTML, ERB, and React. Implemented accessibility best practices, improved site performance and Lighthouse scores, modernised legacy code, ran A/B tests, managed Git workflows, worked with MySQL/PostgreSQL and Docker, and contributed to CMP and privacy systems.

timeline.title: Junior Front-end Developer
timeline.description: Developed responsive websites using SCSS, JavaScript, and MySQL while maintaining clean Git workflows. Conducted debugging and code reviews, implemented accessibility features, enhanced performance, collaborated with UX teams, contributed to CMP systems, and expanded skills in Ruby and ERB.

timeline.title: Junior Front-end Developer
timeline.description: Built responsive and mobile-first components using HTML, CSS/SaSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Tailwind. Created Shopify templates, animations, prototypes, and mockups, worked in Craft CMS, contributed to UX/UI feedback, SEO-aware development, and supported content creation and social media design.

timeline.title: Website Designer (Internship)
timeline.description: Designed websites and mentoring platforms while completing studies. Participated in weekly mentoring sessions and produced branding materials such as letterheads using Figma.

timeline.title: Higher Certificate: Web Design & Development
timeline.description: Trained in UX fundamentals, UI design, HTML/CSS, responsive design, JavaScript, WordPress, and programming foundations, focusing on creating professional digital platforms.

timeline.title: Graphic Design Short Course
timeline.description: Studied Adobe Illustrator, digital imaging, visual communication, typography, layout, print and web design, and the business of graphic design.

timeline.title: Marketing Assistant (Internship)
timeline.description: Supported global marketing operations across Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and the UK, managing social media, content creation, paid campaigns, growth hacking, copywriting, newsletters, regional content, and market research.

timeline.title: Short Course: Design Thinking
timeline.organization: Graduate School of Business – University of Cape Town
timeline.description: Learned design thinking methodologies for innovation across products, services, systems, and business models through the Hasso Plattner d-school program.

timeline.title: Honours in Strategic Brand Management
timeline.description: Studied brand strategy, research, brand building, finance, economics, law, and design thinking to develop innovative solutions for real-world companies.

timeline.title: Bachelor of Commerce in Marketing Management
timeline.description: Built a strong foundation in marketing, business management, finance, economics, accounting, statistics, and project management through real-world brand case studies.

contact.title: Have ideas? Say hello
contact.intro: If you'd like to collaborate, I'd love to hear more about your project.

checkboxGroups.label: Project scope
checkboxGroups.name: projectScope
options: I need help scoping this project
